Headline: #47 47th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 47th, Kedzie
ShortDescription: Westbound 47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, Archer and 47th, due to street blockage near 47th/Kedzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, Archer and 47th, due to street blockage near 47th/Kedzie.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
